(sacred [holy], forest-survival [forestsurvival], recuperation [heal], female [female])

magic paths [mpath]: W1 E1 D2 N3 H2 R19
item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
Petraios and Karya were once companions and lovers. When Petraios died, Karya swore to avenge his death. The dryad has lost focus and purpose and only lives to avenge her dead lover. Her rage has shaken something loose inside her, and now she has walked dangerously close to a darker path.
